message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity. I have a product that holds significant value to me and I believe it could be beneficial to you as well. After careful consideration, I've decided to offer this product to you at a special price. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $12,000. This is a generous offer considering its true worth to me is $15,000 and its value to you is $8,000. I trust that you'll find the product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
